title: Please Help Me
body: My League is not updating, it just says it restored it to a later version. I don't want a later version. and its not even letting me play or anything, its not updating or doing anything, please help me. All I want to do is play some video games.

replies.body: I'd like to help but could really use some more details on what's happening.  Are you getting any error messages?  Are you on the updated or legacy client?  Any specifics can help a lot.  Let me know.
